scripts.start-fakeyou: PORT=7000 BROWSER=none lerna exec --scope @storyteller/fakeyou.com -- yarn start
scripts.start-fakeyou-80: PORT=80 BROWSER=none lerna exec --scope @storyteller/fakeyou.com -- yarn start
scripts.start-storyteller: PORT=7008 BROWSER=none lerna exec --scope @storyteller/storyteller.io -- yarn start
scripts.start-storyteller-w: set PORT=7008 && lerna exec --scope @storyteller/storyteller.io -- yarn start-w
scripts.start-powerstream: PORT=7001 BROWSER=none lerna exec --scope @storyteller/power.stream -- yarn start
scripts.start-powerstream-w: set PORT=7001 && lerna exec --scope @storyteller/power.stream -- yarn start-w
scripts.start-powerstream-dashboard: PORT=7002 BROWSER=none lerna exec --scope @storyteller/power.stream-dashboard -- yarn start
scripts.start-powerstream-dashboard-w: set PORT=7002 && lerna exec --scope @storyteller/power.stream-dashboard -- yarn start-w
scripts.start-powerstream-obs: PORT=7007 BROWSER=none lerna exec --scope @storyteller/power.stream-obs -- yarn start
scripts.start-trumped: PORT=7000 BROWSER=none lerna exec --scope @storyteller/trumped.com -- yarn start
scripts.start-trumped-80: PORT=80 BROWSER=none lerna exec --scope @storyteller/trumped.com -- yarn start
scripts.start-trumped-w: set PORT=7005 && lerna exec --scope @storyteller/trumped.com -- yarn start-w
